thread.title: Jeff Gaudet
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Jeff Gaudet

author: Jeff Gaudet
title: Jeff Gaudet
text: Your staff was very professional and knowledgeable. (Colpits & Steve, wholesale guy) Your waiting room was very clean and comfortable. It was nice to watch TV and have a cup of coffee. I'll b u using Littleton Town Fair again..Thanks, Jeff Gaudet owner JN Gaudet Auto Sales.
